meanings: counter for armor, suits, sets of furniture

sdata.j: ↑青↑↓あお↓い|↑絵↑↓え↓の↑具|↑↓ぐ↓と↑黄色↑↓おうしょく↓の|↑絵↑↓え↓の↑具|↑↓ぐ↓を↑混↑↓ま↓ぜなさい。
sdata.e: Blend the blue paint with the yellow paint.

sdata.j: ↑赤↑↓あか↓い|↑絵↑↓え↓の↑具|↑↓ぐ↓に↑青↑↓あお↓い|↑絵↑↓え↓の↑具|↑↓ぐ↓を↑混↑↓ま↓ぜなさい。
sdata.e: Blend the red paint with the blue paint.
